dashboard.name: Standard Application Metrics
dashboard.description: Baseline visualizations for all business applications.

widgets.title: Error Rate
widgets.nrql: SELECT percentage(count(*), WHERE error IS true) FROM Transaction TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Apdex Score
widgets.nrql: SELECT apdex(duration, t: 0.5) FROM Transaction TIMESERIES

widgets.title: Transaction Breakdown
widgets.nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction FACET name

widgets.title: Infrastructure Health
widgets.nrql: SELECT average(cpuPercent), average(memoryUsedBytes/memoryTotalBytes*100) FROM SystemSample FACET hostname
